name: MarciaGrace Tropin
what_you_do: Marci in the Middle offers faith-based coaching and speaking services focused on personal growth and transformation for women, helping them navigate life transitions and rediscover their passions.
who_you_serve: The target audience includes women seeking personal growth, clarity, and purpose in their lives, particularly those experiencing career shifts or relationship transitions.
business_focus: Marci in the Middle offers faith-based coaching and speaking services focused on personal growth and transformation for women, helping them navigate life transitions and rediscover their passions.
